CustomField.description: Job Scope from BatchApexErrorEvent. The Record IDs that are in scope if the event was fired from the execute() method of a batch job. If the batch job uses custom iterators instead of sObjects, JobScope is the toString() representation of the iterable objects.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The Record IDs that are in scope if the event was fired from the execute() method of a batch job. If the batch job uses custom iterators instead of sObjects, JobScope is the toString() representation of the iterable objects.
CustomField.label: Job Scope
